cause.description:
Stop Illegal's...enough said.
1. Sneaking across a border isn't the proper way to enter a state.
2. If you are illegal we need to find a way to tax you, but maybe not deport you.
3. Build a Wall!
cause.mission: prevent any more illegal's from entering our borders and to find a solution to the one's already here.
cause.name: Stop Illegal Immigration Now!
